data.message: My friend forgot his past word to both his facebook and his email and there has been no help from facebook or hotmail on how he can get it back. does anyone else know some one who is going through the same problem? Neither of them provide a customer service number to resolve this issue.

replies.message: Hi Annette. Your friend may be able to get back into their Facebook account by answering a security question, using an alternate email address listed on their account or getting help from friends. Learn how at: http://on.fb.me/Yd8re6  -Ryan

i have the same problem. The above method does't help. "We're sorry you're having trouble recovering your email address. Unfortunately, this means we can't verify who you are or give you access to the Facebook account you're trying to log into"..... i get this messsage. How do I get my profile back? link https://www.facebook.com/antonio.cerkez.7?fref=ts
how to change my facebook interface Facebook help me please please please https://www.facebook.com/photo.php?fbid=487457018057706&set=a.108187472651331.11155.100003802355027&type=1
